question: Which city will host the "2022 Winter Olympics"?
explanation: Beijing will host the XXIV Olympic Winter Games from 4 to 20 February 2022. The motto of the game is "Joyful Rendezvous Upon Pure Ice and Snow". With this Beijing will be the first city to have hosted both the Summer and Winter Olympics. It will be the first Winter Olympics ever to be held in China. In 2008, Beijing hosted the Summer Olympics.
